title: S1 Ep48: The false promises of agricultural trials
itunes:title: The false promises of agricultural trials
description: Often we hear exciting news of crop yields from experimental trials, but then the gains don't show up in the real world. Rachid Laajaj tells Tim Phillips how a group of researchers solved this puzzle, and what this means for how we conduct trials in future.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
